mapper.insert: INSERT INTO login_history (user_id, device_info, location) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{device_info}, #{location})
mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(device_info, ' (', DATE_FORMAT(login_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'), ')') FROM login_history WHERE user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY login_time DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT location FROM login_history WHERE user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY login_time DESC LIMIT 1
